function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Neglect of spatial information in modeling epidemic interventions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the spatiotemporal evolution of covid-19 in intervention studies","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mode of transmission through close contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining detailed observation data of crowds and resident activity in public health and safety emergencies","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of detailed behavior tracking data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and irregular shape of traditional unit for quarantine measures","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Irregular shape and data acquisition difficulty may lead to ineffective grid regions for disease control and prevention.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quarantine measures allowing unrestricted diffusion of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and control of infected individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on quarantine measures, testing, and personal protective equipment without effective assessment of their impact and implications for disease spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial correlation of human activity and environmental factors affecting transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases similar to covid-19 starting from adjacent spaces and gradually spreading to surrounding regions.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to determine the distribution of infected individuals in each grid region before implementing quarantine measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spatial correlation of infectious disease transmission due to people’s living and work locations","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection spread from adjacent space to surrounding regions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission patterns leading to time series change in the number of newly infected people","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial weight concept used to calculate newly infected people in grid cells","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tobler’s first law of geography influencing covid-19 transmission","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex mathematical equations for calculating infectious grid cell weight","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spatial distribution of hospitals and number of beds impact covid-19 spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data for epidemic modeling","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient sample data due to short time period and unknown infection rates","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in population distribution, population flow, and medical resource detection affecting the spread of early epidemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate reduction in infected curves with a small number of infected humans","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical beds","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient medical beds and hospital isolation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obvious difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations in mapping model parameters to geographical space","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of data on spatiotemporal attributes such as patients’ tracking data, residents’ activity data, passengers’ travel data of buses and subways, and mobile location data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data in a public health safety emergency, which usually features missing or incomplete coverage","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited detection in rural areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of detailed epidemic data","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilizing multi-source data, such as network news data, global event databases, and remote sensing data, may pose privacy and data security risks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective quarantine measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete data on reported cases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through respiratory system","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain origin of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preventive measures for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
